title: BitcoinPenny
author: BitcoinPenny
created_time: January 15, 2023, 11:35:23 PMLast edit: September 07, 2023, 11:34:25 PM by BitcoinPenny
content: Hello, everyone. Just a quick little "for sale" post to round out your weekend.We have four (4) copies of this collectible magazine available for sale. Includes bonus fold-out poster inside.Only $250 $150 USD per copy with FREE SHIPPING in the USA. (Non-USA residents pay an additional $10 USD shipping charge per copy.)The official Bitcoin Magazine website sells copies for $615 each, so you can save a good bit of cash in this thread. (That's if saving cash is something you're into, of course.)Happiness guaranteed.Regards,Chris

comments.author: BitcoinPenny
comments.body: Weekend bump with new lower price for this forgotten thread.Regards,Chris

comments.author: Doncusuco
comments.body: I'm interested in 1 copy if you still have it. How can i pay you?

comments.author: BitcoinPenny
comments.body: Price dropped to only $150 per copy in the USA. (Add $25 for international deliveries.)Regards,Chris
